Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to adding veterans to protected classes for unlawful housing discrimination
Summary: Adds veterans to protected classes for unlawful housing discrimination regardless of discharge status.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to adding veterans to protected classes for unlawful housing discrimination
